Protocols/MenuViewDataSource/menuView(_:.name: menuView(_:badgeViewAtIndex:)
Protocols/MenuViewDataSource/menuView(_:.abstract: 角标 (例如消息提醒的小红点) 的数据源方法，在 WMPageController 中实现这个方法来为 menuView 提供一个 badgeView 需要在返回的时候同时设置角标的 frame 属性，该 frame 为相对于 menuItem 的位置

Protocols/MenuViewDataSource.html#/c:@M@.name: menuView(_:initialMenuItem:atIndex:)
Protocols/MenuViewDataSource.html#/c:@M@.abstract: 用于定制 MenuItem，可以对传出的 initialMenuItem 进行修改定制，也可以返回自己创建的子类，需要注意的是，此时的 item 的 frame 是不确定的，所以请勿根据此时的 frame 做计算！如需根据 frame 修改，请使用代理

Classes/ProgressView.html#/s:21PageContr.name: speedFactor
Classes/ProgressView.html#/s:21PageContr.abstract: 进度条的速度因数，默认为 15，越小越快， 大于 0

Classes/ProgressView.html#/s:21PageContr.name: naughty
Classes/ProgressView.html#/s:21PageContr.abstract: 调皮属性，用于实现新腾讯视频效果

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: viewControllerClasses
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 各个控制器的 class

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: titles
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 各个控制器标题

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: currentViewController
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 当前vc

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: selectIndex
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 设置选中几号 item

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: pageAnimatable
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 点击的 MenuItem 是否触发滚动动画

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: automaticallyCalculatesItemWidths
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 是否自动通过字符串计算 MenuItem 的宽度，默认为 NO

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: scrollEnable
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: Whether the controller can scroll. Default is YES

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: titleSizeSelected
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 选中时的标题尺寸

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: titleSizeNormal
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 非选中时的标题尺寸

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: titleColorSelected
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 标题选中时的颜色, 颜色是可动画的.

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: titleColorNormal
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 标题非选择时的颜色, 颜色是可动画的.

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: titleFontName
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 标题的字体名字

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: menuItemWidth
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 每个 MenuItem 的宽度

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: itemsWidths
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 各个 MenuItem 的宽度，可不等，数组内为

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: progressWidth
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 定制进度条，若每个进度条长度相同，可设置该属性

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: scrollView
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 内部容器

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: progressViewIsNaughty
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 调皮效果

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: postNotification
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 是否发送在创建控制器或者视图完全展现在用户眼前时通知观察者，默认为不开启，如需利用通知请开启

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: rememberLocation
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 是否记录 Controller 的位置，并在下次回来的时候回到相应位置，默认为 NO (若当前缓存中存在不会触发

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: cachePolicy
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 缓存的机制，默认为无限制 (如果收到内存警告, 会自动切换)

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: preloadPolicy
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 预加载机制，在停止滑动的时候预加载 n 页

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: bounces
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: Whether ContentView bounces

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: showOnNavigationBar
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 是否作为 NavigationBar 的 titleView 展示，默认 NO

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: startDragging
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 用代码设置 contentView 的 contentOffset 之前，请设置 startDragging = YES

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: progressHeight
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 下划线进度条的高度

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: itemsMargins
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 顶部菜单栏各个 item 的间隙，因为包括头尾两端，所以确保它的数量等于控制器数量 + 1, 默认间隙为 0

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: itemMargin
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: set itemMargin if all margins are the same, default is 0 如果各个间隙都想同，设置该属性，默认为 0

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: progressViewBottomSpace
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: progressView 到 menuView 底部的距离

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: progressViewCornerRadius
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: progressView’s cornerRadius

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: menuView
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 顶部导航栏

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: contentView
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 内部容器

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: menuViewContentMargin
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: MenuView 内部视图与左右的间距

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: childViewFrames
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 用于记录子控制器view的frame，用于 scrollView 上的展示的位置

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: displayVC
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 当前展示在屏幕上的控制器，方便在滚动的时候读取 (避免不必要计算)

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: posRecords
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 用于记录销毁的viewController的位置 (如果它是某一种scrollView的Controller的话)

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: memoryWarningCount
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 收到内存警告的次数

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: updateTitle(_:atIndex:)
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 更新指定序号的控制器的标题

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: updateTitle(_:atIndex:andWidth:)
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 更新指定序号的控制器的标题以及他的宽度

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: calculateSize()
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 包括宽高，子控制器视图 frame

Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.name: removeViewController(_:_:)
Classes/PageController.html#/s:21PageCon.abstract: 移除控制器,且从display中移除

Classes/PageController.html#/c:@M@PageCo.name: willResignActive(_:)
Classes/PageController.html#/c:@M@PageCo.abstract: 当 app 即将进入后台接收到的通知

Classes/PageController.html#/c:@M@PageCo.name: willEnterForeground(_:)
Classes/PageController.html#/c:@M@PageCo.abstract: 当 app 即将回到前台接收到的通知

Classes/MenuView.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: speedFactor
Classes/MenuView.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: 进度条的速度因数，默认为 15，越小越快， 大于 0

Classes/MenuView.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: refreshContenOffset()
Classes/MenuView.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: 立即刷新 menuView 的 contentOffset，使 title 居中

Classes/MenuView.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: calculateItemFrames()
Classes/MenuView.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: 计算所有item的frame值，主要是为了适配所有item的宽度之和小于屏幕宽的情况

Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: normalSize
Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: Normal状态的字体大小，默认大小为15

Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: selectedSize
Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: Selected状态的字体大小，默认大小为18

Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: normalColor
Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: Normal状态的字体颜色，默认为黑色

Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: selectedColor
Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: Selected状态的字体颜色，默认为红色 (可动画)

Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.name: speedFactor
Classes/MenuItem.html#/s:21PageControlle.abstract: 进度条的速度因数，默认 15，越小越快, 必须大于0

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
